description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via Stdin in Scripts
name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Stdin - System
query: winlog.channel:System AND (event.code:7045 AND (winlog.event_data.ImagePath:(*environment* OR *invoke* OR *input*)) AND (winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*set* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*\&\&*) AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager)
author: Nikita Nazarov, oscd.community
